effect_entries.effect:
Held
:   When the holder uses a damaging fighting-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging fighting-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text_entries.text: A gem with an essence of combat. When held, it strengthens the power of a Fighting-type move only once.
